messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Arnold Frenzel
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all, First of all, happy holidays and happy New Year. Second, I need to get in touch with Arnold and require his phone number. If someone knows if, could
messages.messageBody:
Hi all,

First of all, happy holidays and happy New Year. Second, I need to get in touch
with Arnold and require his phone number. If someone knows if, could you contact
me off this. This is rather urgent. Thanks.

Gordon
